00001 #ifndef WORKQUEUE_SNOW_H
00002 #define WORKQUEUE_SNOW_H
00003 
00004 #include <pthread.h>
00005 #include <list>
00006 
00007 template <typename T> class wqueue
00008 { 
00009 
00010   public:
00011   wqueue() {
00012     pthread_mutex_init(&m_mutex, NULL);
00013     pthread_cond_init(&m_condv, NULL);
00014   }
00015 
00016   ~wqueue() {
00017     pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_mutex);
00018     pthread_cond_destroy(&m_condv);
00019   }
00020 
00021   void add(T item) {
00022     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00023     m_queue.push_back(item);
00024     pthread_cond_signal(&m_condv);
00025     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00026   }
00027 
00028   T remove() {
00029     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00030     while (m_queue.size() == 0) {
00031       pthread_cond_wait(&m_condv, &m_mutex);
00032     }
00033     T item = m_queue.front();
00034     m_queue.pop_front();
00035     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00036     return item;
00037   }
00038 
00039   int size() {
00040     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00041     int size = m_queue.size();
00042     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00043     return size;
00044   }
00045 
00046   std::list<T>   m_queue;
00047   pthread_mutex_t m_mutex;
00048   pthread_cond_t  m_condv;
00049 
00050 };
00051 
00052 class SnowThread {
00053 
00054   public:
00055   SnowThread() : m_tid(0), m_running(0), m_detached(0) {}
00056   
00057   ~SnowThread()
00058   {
00059     if (m_running == 1 && m_detached == 0) {
00060       pthread_detach(m_tid);
00061     }
00062     if (m_running == 1) {
00063       pthread_cancel(m_tid);
00064     }
00065   }
00066 
00067   static void* runThread(void* arg)
00068   {
00069     return ((SnowThread*)arg)->run();
00070   }
00071  
00072   int start()
00073   {
00074     int result = pthread_create(&m_tid, NULL, runThread, this);
00075     if (result == 0) {
00076       m_running = 1;
00077     }
00078     return result;
00079   }
00080 
00081   int join()
00082   {
00083     int result = -1;
00084     if (m_running == 1) {
00085       result = pthread_join(m_tid, NULL);
00086       if (result == 0) {
00087         m_detached = 1;
00088       }
00089     }
00090     return result;
00091   }
00092  
00093   int detach()
00094   {
00095     int result = -1;
00096     if (m_running == 1 && m_detached == 0) {
00097       result = pthread_detach(m_tid);
00098       if (result == 0) {
00099         m_detached = 1;
00100       }
00101     }
00102     return result;
00103   }
00104 
00105   pthread_t self() {
00106     return m_tid;
00107   }
00108 
00109   virtual void* run() = 0;
00110  
00111 private:
00112   pthread_t  m_tid;
00113   int        m_running;
00114   int        m_detached;
00115 };
00116 
00117 template <class T>
00118   class ConsumerThread : public SnowThread {
00119  
00120 public:
00121 
00122   ConsumerThread(wqueue<T*>& queue, bool verbose) : m_queue(queue), m_verbose(verbose) {}
00123  
00124   void* run() {
00125     // Remove 1 item at a time and process it. Blocks if no items are 
00126     // available to process.
00127     for (int i = 0;; i++) {
00128       //if (m_verbose)
00129         //printf("thread %lu, loop %d - waiting for item...\n", 
00130         //     (long unsigned int)self(), i);
00131       T* item = (T*)m_queue.remove();
00132       item->run();
00133       //m_output->push_back(item->output());
00134       delete item;
00135       if (m_queue.size() == 0)
00136         return NULL;
00137     }
00138     return NULL;
00139   }
00140 
00141   //std::vector<O*> getThreadOutput() {return m_output;}
00142 
00143  private: 
00144   wqueue<T*>& m_queue;
00145   bool m_verbose;
00146 
00147 };
00148 
00149 #endif
